translations: adj.醒悟的；幻想破灭的；不抱幻想的
v.使幻想破灭（disillusion 的过去分词）；唤醒

phrs.translation: 看破红尘, 幻想破灭的, 醒悟的
看破, 对……不再抱有希望

sentences.sentence: His fictionalized portrait of the artist as a young man is recalled by an older, disillusioned narrator.
sentences.translation: 他虚构的艺术家年轻时的肖像由一位年长、醒悟的叙述者回忆起来。

sentences.sentence: His fictionalized portrait of the artist as a young man is recalled by an older, disillusioned narrator.
sentences.translation: 他虚构的艺术家年轻时的肖像由一位年长、醒悟的叙述者回忆起来。

sentences.sentence: He has deceived and disillusioned us all.
sentences.translation: 他欺骗了我们所有人, 令我们所有人失望至极。
